reviews.review_msg: Awesome prof. I had him for Psych 101 at UFV and it's an easy A if you just study for the midterm and do the project. The project is pretty easy and he doesn't make you present it. The midterm is on the power points shown in  class and the textbook. If you miss a day it's okay because he has all the power points online as well. Recommend him!

I had Prof. Poole even before he had finished his Ph.D., and already then, he was one of the best profs I could have then imagined.  Turns out, 17 years later as I finish my own Ph.D, (in a different field) I was right.  An amazingly gifted teacher who you would never forget if you ever had the great fortune to have learned from him. Inspirational.
